function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on global supply chains","Impact":"Vulnerability to disruption during a pandemic, leading to shortages of essential goods","Mitigation":"Encouraging localised manufacturing and diversification of supply sources","Technologies":"Digital manufacturing technologies, automation, and robotics","People":"Global population, particularly in areas highly dependent on imports","Owner":"Governments, industries, and local communities"},{"Description":"Strain on global food supply chains","Impact":"Increased food insecurity, particularly for the poorest citizens","Mitigation":"Investing in resilient and diversified food supply chains, promoting local agriculture, and reducing food waste","Technologies":"Vertical farming, precision agriculture, and supply chain management systems","People":"Global population, particularly the poorest citizens","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, and local communities"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of pharmaceutical supply chains","Impact":"Shortages of essential medicines during pandemics or global crises","Mitigation":"Diversifying sources of pharmaceutical ingredients, promoting local pharmaceutical production, and investing in stockpiling essential medicines","Technologies":"Pharmaceutical manufacturing technologies, quality control systems, and supply chain monitoring tools","People":"Global population relying on essential medicines","Owner":"Pharmaceutical industry, governments, and healthcare organizations"}]}
